artist: Artist: Kevin Huizenga; Printer: Stinehour Press, Lunnenberg, Vermont; Publisher: The Center for Cartoon Studies, White River Junction, Vt.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of various drawings, designs, and text printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 18 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: How to Start to Think About Learning to Draw Comics
